text:
Susan Florence Anspach (November 23, 1942 – April 2, 2018) was an American actress. She was best known for her roles in movies during the 1970s such as "Five Easy Pieces" (1970), "Play It Again, Sam" (1972), "Blume in Love" (1973), and during the 1980s such as "Montenegro".
Anspach died on April 2, 2018 in Los Angeles, California of heart failure at the age of 75.
